participant_1.background:
I sleep better when I have my favorite stuffed animal next to me.
I like to dye my hair a bright shade of red.
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I spent my birthday alone, but I still made it a relaxing and enjoyable day.
i just moved to los angeles from tokyo.

I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
i have trouble feeling emotion.
i sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing alright. I just moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo, and I'm still getting used to the city.
Oh, wow! That's a big move. What brought you to LA?
I got a job offer with a company here, and I thought it would be a good opportunity to start fresh.
That's awesome! Congratulations on the new job! I'm sure you'll love it here. LA is a great city.
Thanks! I'm excited to explore it and see what it has to offer.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun. There are so many things to do here. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to read, write, and go for walks. I also like to watch movies and listen to music.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read and go for walks too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read a variety of books, but I'm especially drawn to historical fiction and mysteries.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I really enjoyed "The Name of the Rose" by Umberto Eco and "The Book Thief" by Markus Zusak.
I've heard good things about both of those books. I'll have to check them out.
